views.markdown:
-Fixed highres resolution (Thanks Mithrendal) -Display bug fixes in several games (Thanks Mithrendal) -64bit support -configurable Memory -fixed crash in settings if no rom file is present -Controller4All works with iUAE again
-Fixed backward compatibility to iOS 7/8
-Emulator now plays sound alongside other apps
-fixing settings for multiple configurations
-iOS 10 compatibility
-Use Gamecontroller to Move mouse
-Option to Boot HD Readonly
-Support for Multiple Joypads
-Use your Idevice as a Joypad
-Gyroscope option for Vpad
-HD Support
-Kickstart Rom Selector
-Support for Cloanto Amiga Forever Roms and 256k Roms
-Improvement in Memory handling
-Many small improvements
-Support for Multiple Configurations
-Completely Redesigned OnScreen Joypad (Supports Up To Four Programmable Buttons now)
-Map Amiga Keyboard Buttons to Physical Joypad or Onscreen Joypad
-New GUI
-Configurable Onscreen Buttons to Map Keyboard Buttons (Thanks SimonToens)
-Support for df2 to df4 (Thanks Simontoens)
-Roms and Adf files can now be copied using Itunes
-Various Crash fixes. Chaos Engine now runs. Turrican 2 is more stable (Thanks SimonTones)
-Enabled Sprite To Sprite Collision Detection. Games Like Archon and Gravity Force run now (Thanks Mithendral)
-Several New Options for Display Settings
Thanks to simon the following issues got fixed:
-Fixed Sound latency
-Fixed errors when loading savestate
-Bugfixes for iCade Joypad
-Includes support for MFI Game Controllers. It's untested however, because I had no hardware to test it with. Any feedback welcome.
-Correct screen proportion (4:3)
-Option for old behavior that fills screen
-Bug fixes layout for iPhone 5/5s
-Support iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
Improved compatibility because of new CPU Core from UAE4ALL2. Games now Running Include Alien Breed, Flashback, and Monkey Island
Enhanced Keyboard with section for Custom Keys Like Numpad or Right-Shift. Some games require this Keys. This makes following games Playable now for example.

-Gobliiins (You need Numkeys to get past Language selection)
-North & South. Right Shift needed.

I'm aware this feature might not be perfect. For improvement suggestions write me or visit my Website at http://www.iuae-emulator.net
-Moved Menu Bar further down, so it doesn't overlap status bar anymore. This makes Menu Bar more reactive.

-To keep left mouse button pressed. Touch screen and don't move your finger for one second. Left mouse button stays pressed after this until you release the screen. This enables Drag and Drop in Workbench or the fan in Lemmings 2 for instance.
-Fixed Onscreen Joystick

-You can call your Kickstart Romfile kick.rom or kick13.rom. Sorry for the confusion caused
